proposals.title: Predict Bangladesh Rice Export Values Using Domestic Production Data
proposals.problem_statement: Forecast INR value of rice exports to Bangladesh using historical production data with ≥65% data completeness in all columns. Leverage 2020-2024 production trends to predict 2025 exports.

join_plan.notes: Temporal join using 1-year lag: production in year X predicts exports in year X+1. Financial years mapped via cleaned year prefixes.

feature_plan.handling_missingness: Forward-fill for <15% missing values in 2024-25 target column

proposals.validation_plan: Time-series cross-validation with 80% training (2018-2023) / 20% testing (2024) split

excluded_columns.reason: Future data not available for training

expected_outputs: Regression model predicting INR export values

proposals.title: Forecast Domestic Rice Cultivation Area Using Historical Trends
proposals.problem_statement: Predict the area under rice cultivation for future financial years using historical area data across seasons. All columns verified ≥65% data completeness.

join_plan.notes: No joins required; single-dataset time series prediction

feature_plan.handling_missingness: Forward-fill for missing historical area values

proposals.validation_plan: Time series cross-validation with 3-year rolling windows
quality_checks: Check feature importance alignment with agricultural seasons
Validate prediction intervals against historical variance

excluded_columns.reason: Used as most recent feature rather than target

proposals.title: Predict Bangladesh Rice Export Values Using Domestic Cultivation Area Trends
proposals.problem_statement: Forecast rice export values to Bangladesh using historical domestic cultivation area data for rice. All columns verified ≥65% data completeness.

join_plan.notes: Join on 'Rice' crop and financial year alignment (e.g., Area-2020-21 → 2020-21 export values).

proposals.validation_plan: Time-series cross-validation using 2018-21 as training, 2022-24 as validation
quality_checks: Check correlation between area and export values
